content.html: Introducing Barrel-Aged Peanut Butter Stout, the next entry in our Mothership Series! Like a peanut butter cup in a glass, this Barrel-Aged Peanut Butter Stout’s is smooth yet not overly sweet. Exclusive to taprooms on December 16. No peanuts were harmed in the making!
content.value:
Introducing Barrel-Aged Peanut Butter Stout, the next entry in our Mothership Series!

Like a peanut butter cup in a glass, this Barrel-Aged Peanut Butter Stout’s is smooth yet not overly sweet. Exclusive to taprooms on December 16. No peanuts were harmed in the making!
